jokes: Chuck Norris doesn't read books. He stares them down until he gets the information he wants.
Time waits for no man. Unless that man is Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris' tears cure cancer. Too bad he has never cried.
Chuck Norris can kill two stones with one bird.
There is no chin behind Chuck Norris' beard. There is only another fist.
The chief export of Chuck Norris is pain.
Chuck Norris once kicked a horse in the chin. Its descendants are known today as giraffes.
Chuck Norris caught the Corona virus. He keeps it chained in his back yard.
Chuck Norris won the Tour de France with a stationary bicycle.
Chuck Norris doesn't have any enemies. Well, not anymore.
Chuck Norris can touch his right elbow with his right hand.
Chuck Norris can roll his eyes back in your head.
The Earth is Chuck Norris's treadmill.
Chuck Norris joined the UFC, everybody else quits.
Chuck Norris does his routine doctor's check up every 100 years.
Chuck Norris's PIN is the last 4 digits of Pi.
Jaws stays on the beach when Chuck Norris swims.
Chuck Norris was once run over by a tank. He refused to pay for it.
Chuck Norris grocery shops at the Home Depot.
Freddie Krueger is afraid that Chuck Norris might one day get tired and take a nap.
Chuck Norris once arm-wrestled himself and won.
A toll booth pays Chuck Norris to pass.
Chuck Norris counted to infinity. Twice.
Chuck Norris can divide by zero.
Chuck Norris doesn't wear a watch. He decides what time it is.
Chuck Norris can slam a revolving door.
Chuck Norris can speak Braille.
Chuck Norris can unscramble an egg.
Chuck Norris can hear sign language.
Chuck Norris can do a wheelie on a unicycle.
Chuck Norris doesn't sleep. He waits.
Chuck Norris doesn't do push-ups. He pushes the Earth down.
Chuck Norris can delete the Recycling Bin.
Chuck Norris can build a snowman out of rain.
Chuck Norris can strangle you with a cordless phone.
Chuck Norris knows Victoria's secret.
Chuck Norris can light a fire by rubbing two ice cubes together.
Chuck Norris doesn't shower, he only takes blood baths.
Chuck Norris makes onions cry.
Chuck Norris can win a game of Connect Four in only three moves.
Chuck Norris doesn't cheat death. He wins fair and square.
Chuck Norris can play the violin with a piano.
Chuck Norris once ate a whole cake before his friends could tell him there was a stripper in it.
Chuck Norris doesn't need Twitter. He's already following you.
Chuck Norris threw a grenade and killed 50 people. Then it exploded.
Chuck Norris can set ants on fire with a magnifying glass. At night.
Chuck Norris has a grizzly bear carpet in his room. It's not dead, it's just afraid to move.
Chuck Norris doesn't dial the wrong number. You answer the wrong phone.
Chuck Norris can kill your imaginary friends.
Chuck Norris can cut a knife with butter.
Chuck Norris once won a staring contest with the sun.
Chuck Norris can tie his shoes with his feet.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a key to drive his car. It just starts when he approaches.
Chuck Norris can squeeze orange juice out of a lemon.
Chuck Norris can make a Happy Meal cry.
Chuck Norris doesn't use spell check. If he misspells a word, the dictionary changes the spelling.
Chuck Norris can drown a fish.
Chuck Norris ordered a Big Mac at Burger King, and got one.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a GPS. He decides where he wants to be.
Chuck Norris can whistle in sign language.
Chuck Norris can do a handstand with his feet on the ground.
Chuck Norris doesn't get frostbite. Chuck Norris bites frost.
Chuck Norris doesn't read. Words just surrender their information.
Chuck Norris can play Russian Roulette with a fully loaded gun and win.
Chuck Norris doesn't turn on the shower. He stares at it until it cries.
Chuck Norris can cook minute rice in 30 seconds.
Chuck Norris can sneeze with his eyes open.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a flashlight. The dark fears Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris can stand at the bottom of a bottomless pit.
Chuck Norris doesn't play the lottery. It's a waste of his time to already know the winning numbers.
Chuck Norris can hit you so hard that he can actually alter your DNA.
Chuck Norris doesn't get brain freeze. Brains know not to freeze when Chuck Norris eats ice cream.
Chuck Norris can hear you think.
Chuck Norris can win tic-tac-toe in one move.
Chuck Norris doesn't breathe. Air hides in his lungs for protection.
Chuck Norris can touch MC Hammer.
Chuck Norris doesn't need an umbrella. Rain knows better than to fall on him.
Chuck Norris can program in binary using only ones.
Chuck Norris doesn't go hunting. Hunting implies a chance of failure. Chuck Norris goes killing.
Chuck Norris can clap with one hand.
Chuck Norris doesn't have a computer. Just a basement full of Asian kids.
Chuck Norris can punch you in the back of the face.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a map. Maps need Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris can gargle peanut butter.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a parachute to go skydiving. He needs a parachute to go skydiving twice.
Chuck Norris can make a slinky go upstairs.
Chuck Norris doesn't bowl strikes. He just knocks down one pin and the other nine faint.
Chuck Norris doesn't walk. The ground moves beneath him.
Chuck Norris can iron wrinkles out of water.
Chuck Norris doesn't need Wi-Fi. He's already connected to everything.
Chuck Norris can text message using a rotary phone.
Chuck Norris doesn't buy insurance. Insurance buys Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris can believe it's not butter.
Chuck Norris doesn't need to knock. Doors open themselves out of respect.
Chuck Norris can speak French in Russian.
Chuck Norris doesn't need luck. Luck needs Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris can paint a masterpiece using only a roller.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a bookmark. Books remember where he stopped reading.
Chuck Norris can lick his elbow. And yours too.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a lawyer. The law needs Chuck Norris.
Chuck Norris can build a castle in the air.
Chuck Norris doesn't need Google. He already knows everything.
Chuck Norris can parallel park a train.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a remote control. Things just change when he wants them to.
Chuck Norris can fold a fitted sheet perfectly on the first try.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a password. Systems just let him in.
Chuck Norris can tune a fish.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a thermometer. He decides what temperature it is.
Chuck Norris can write invisible ink without invisible ink.
Chuck Norris doesn't need a mailbox. The mail knows to find him.

metadata.description: A collection of Chuck Norris style jokes inspired by the legendary Chuck Norris Facts meme format
